CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISBLANK(Estimated_Wallet_Size_Overwrite__c), Estimated_Wallet_Size_Overwrite__c = 0), MAX( EWS_Fallback__c * IF( Record_Type__c = "Agency Sales", 0.2, IF(Record_Type__c = "Discarded", 0, 1) ), Bookings_Last_12_Months_Hierarchy__c ), IF( Bookings_Last_12_Months_Hierarchy__c > Estimated_Wallet_Size_Overwrite__c, Bookings_Last_12_Months_Hierarchy__c, Estimated_Wallet_Size_Overwrite__c ) )
